rules.title: Mutual NDA (both parties bound)
rules.recommendation: Ensure obligations are reciprocal, e.g., 'Each party shall maintain the confidentiality of the other party’s Confidential Information.'

rules.title: No blanket residuals clause
rules.recommendation: Remove residuals language or narrowly limit to non-confidential general skills.

rules.title: Confidentiality term capped (≤ 2 years)
rules.recommendation: Replace perpetual obligations with a fixed term of 2 years from disclosure.

rules.title: No non-solicit/compete in NDA
rules.recommendation: Remove non-solicit/compete; address separately if needed.

rules.title: Equitable relief permitted
rules.recommendation: Include: 'Breach may cause irreparable harm and injunctive relief may be appropriate.'

rules.title: No transfer of IP ownership
rules.recommendation: Remove any assignment/transfer; NDA should only govern confidentiality.

rules.title: Return or destroy upon request/termination
rules.recommendation: Add return/destroy obligations upon request or termination.

rules.title: If a California party is involved, prefer CA governing law
rules.recommendation: Consider negotiating California governing law given a California party.

rules.title: Avoid one-sided exclusive venue
rules.recommendation: Prefer neutral venue or mutual consent.
